quote: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Mine

quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Everyone has inside them a piece of good news. The good news is you don’t know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Press on - nothing can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Perseverance and determination alone are omnipotent.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Experience is not what happens to you; it is what you do with what happens to you.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
author: Og Mandino

quote: It doesn’t matter how slow you go as long as you don’t stop.

author.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

author.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author.author: Theodore Roosevelt

author.quote: Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won’t have a title until much later.
author.author: Bob Goff

author.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
author.author: Kenji Miyazawa

author.quote: And you ask ‘What if I fall?’ Oh but my darling, what if you fly?
author.author: Erin Hanson

author.quote: Each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
author.author: Rosemonde Gerard

author.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.

author: Angelita Lim

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination. Joy is found not in finishing an activity but in doing it.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: When we stop opposing reality, action becomes simple, fluid, kind, and fearless.
author: Byron Katie

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I can’t promise to fix all your problems, but I can promise you won’t have to face them all alone.
author: Unknown

quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
author: T. Tolis

quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
author: Anne Frank

quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: Christopher Robin

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If you focus on what you left behind, you will never see what lies ahead.
author: Gusteau, Ratatouille

quote: Remember you’re the one who can fill the world with sunshine.
author: Snow White

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says ‘I’m possible’!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: Before you act, listen. Before you react, think. Before you spend, earn. Before you criticize, wait. Before you pray, forgive. Before you quit, try.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Never look back, darling. It distracts for the now.
author: Edna Mode, The Incredibles

quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Winning doesn’t always mean being first. Winning means you’re doing better than you’ve done before.
author: Bonnie Blair

quote: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Be Silly, Be Honest, Be Kind.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever - the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: A ship is always safe at the shore - but that is NOT what it is built for.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Next to trying and winning, the best thing is trying and failing.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Every small positive change we make in ourselves repays us in confidence in the future.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
author: Mario Fernandez

quote: Your destiny is to fulfill those things upon which you focus most intently. So choose to keep your focus on that which is truly magnificent, beautiful, uplifting and joyful. Your life is always moving toward something.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
author: John Lennon

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: We are each gifted in a unique and important way. It is our privilege and our adventure to discover our own special light.
author: Mary Dunbar
